co.cask.coopr.provisioner
Class TenantProvisionerService

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.coopr.provisioner.TenantProvisionerService

public class TenantProvisionerService
extends Object

Service for managing provisioners.

          Handle the heartbeat of a provisioner, updating the last heartbeat time of the provisioner and updating the number of live workers running on the provisioner for each tenant it is responsible for.

          Rebalance workers for the tenant across the provisioners.

          Verify that tenant cluster and node quotas would not be exceeded if the given number of additional clusters and nodes would be added.

          Verify that tenant cluster and node quotas would not be exceeded if the given number of additional clusters and nodes would be added.
 void syncResources(Account account)
          Get a snapshot of what plugin resources are slated to be active on the provisioners that are running workers for the given account, and push those resources to the provisioners.

          Delete and reassign workers for provisioners that have not sent a heartbeat since the given timestamp in milliseconds.

getProvisioner

public Provisioner getProvisioner(String provisionerId)
                           throws IOException
Get the provisioner for the given id for external display, with tenant ids mapped to tenant names, or null if none exists.

Parameters:
provisionerId - Id of the provisioner to get
Returns:
Provisioner for the given id with tenant ids mapped to tenant names, or null if none exists
Throws:
IOException

writeTenantSpecification

public String writeTenantSpecification(TenantSpecification tenantSpecification)
                                throws IOException,
                                       CapacityException,
                                       QuotaException
Write the tenant to the store and balance the tenant workers across provisioners. Returns the id of the tenant that was written.

Parameters:
tenantSpecification - Tenant to write
Returns:
Id of the written tenant
Throws:
IOException - if there was an exception persisting the tenant
CapacityException - if there is not enough capacity to support all tenant workers
QuotaException - if a tenant quota would be violated by the change

satisfiesTenantQuotas

public boolean satisfiesTenantQuotas(String tenantId,
                                     int additionalClusters,
                                     int additionalNodes)
                              throws IOException
Verify that tenant cluster and node quotas would not be exceeded if the given number of additional clusters and nodes would be added.

Parameters:
tenantId - Id of the tenant to verify quotas for
additionalClusters - Number of clusters that would be added
additionalNodes - Number of nodes that would be added
Returns:
true if the tenant quotas would be satisfied, false if they would be exceeded.
Throws:
IOException

satisfiesTenantQuotas

public boolean satisfiesTenantQuotas(Tenant tenant,
                                     int additionalClusters,
                                     int additionalNodes)
                              throws IOException
Verify that tenant cluster and node quotas would not be exceeded if the given number of additional clusters and nodes would be added.

Parameters:
tenant - Tenant to verify quotas for
additionalClusters - Number of clusters that would be added
additionalNodes - Number of nodes that would be added
Returns:
true if the tenant quotas would be satisfied, false if they would be exceeded.
Throws:
IOException

deleteTenantByName

public void deleteTenantByName(String name)
                        throws IllegalStateException,
                               IOException
Delete the given tenant. A tenant must not have any assigned workers in order for deletion to be allowed.

Parameters:
name - Name of the tenant to delete
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the tenant has one or more assigned workers
IOException - if there was an exception persisting the deletion

deleteProvisioner

public void deleteProvisioner(String provisionerId)
                       throws IOException
Delete the given provisioner, queueing a job to reassign its workers to different provisioners.

Parameters:
provisionerId - Id of the provisioner to delete
Throws:
IOException

handleHeartbeat

public void handleHeartbeat(String provisionerId,
                            ProvisionerHeartbeat heartbeat)
                     throws IOException,
                            MissingEntityException
Handle the heartbeat of a provisioner, updating the last heartbeat time of the provisioner and updating the number of live workers running on the provisioner for each tenant it is responsible for.

Parameters:
provisionerId - Id of the provisioner that sent the heartbeat
heartbeat - The heartbeat containing live worker information
Throws:
IOException - if there was an exception persisting the data
MissingEntityException - if there is no provisioner for the given id

writeProvisioner

public void writeProvisioner(Provisioner provisioner)
                      throws IOException
Write a provisioner, and queue jobs to rebalance workers for all tenants in the system.

Parameters:
provisioner - Provisioner to write
Throws:
IOException

rebalanceTenantWorkers

public void rebalanceTenantWorkers(String tenantId)
                            throws IOException,
                                   CapacityException
Rebalance workers for the tenant across the provisioners.

Parameters:
tenantId - Id of the tenant whose workers need to be rebalanced
Throws:
CapacityException - if there is not enough capacity to rebalance tenant workers
IOException - if there was an exception persisting the worker rebalance

syncResources

public void syncResources(Account account)
                   throws IOException
Get a snapshot of what plugin resources are slated to be active on the provisioners that are running workers for the given account, and push those resources to the provisioners.

Parameters:
account - Account to sync
Throws:
IOException

timeoutProvisioners

public void timeoutProvisioners(long timeoutTs)
                         throws IOException
Delete and reassign workers for provisioners that have not sent a heartbeat since the given timestamp in milliseconds.

Parameters:
timeoutTs - Timestamp in milliseconds to use as a cut off for deleting provisioners.
Throws:
IOException

bootstrapTenant

public void bootstrapTenant(String tenantId)
                     throws IOException,
                            IllegalAccessException
Throws:
IOException
IllegalAccessException
